review: we were very disappointed in this product.  first of all, the software had problems the screen kept freezing. Second, compared to our Roku it was far harder to navigate when it did work. Finally, since we already have Roku and Amazon Prime we were looking for internet access and HBO GO. This product had neither. If you want Netflix and Amazon Prime get a Roku. It is much easier to work

review: Not bad at all. It's easy to use, easy to set up. If your TV has a usb, use it to power this device. Much faster and a cleaner look instead of being plugged into the wall. Doesn't take long to load videos. Video quality is nice too. I liked it so much, I bought three. Made my dumb TVs into smart tvs.
